first_para: Sheila Gilmore (born 1 October 1949) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Edinburgh East since 2010. Gilmore stood for the seat following the decision of Gavin Strang MP to stand down; she is a former City of Edinburgh councillor.

full.extract:
Sheila Gilmore (born 1 October 1949) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Edinburgh East since 2010. Gilmore stood for the seat following the decision of Gavin Strang MP to stand down; she is a former City of Edinburgh councillor.
^ http://www.ukwhoswho.com/view/article/oupww/whoswho/U251350/
^ "Election 2010 Edinburgh East Result". BBC News.
full.title: Sheila Gilmore
